ValidationRule.description: When American Express is selected, card number must be in ####-######-##### format.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Credit_Card_Type__c ,"American Express") && NOT( REGEX( Credit_Card_Number__c, "[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{5}") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: American Express card numbers must be in ####-######-##### format including dashes.
